page.title: 17Travelling Shops
page.content: A library van comes on Friday afternoons from three thirty till four thirty and it parks in the Village Hall car park.It comes from Petworth with a man and a lady.Old people and families go to it.If you have a book out for more than a week you are not charged any money.The wet fish van comes on Wednesday mornings and parks in the Forester's pub car park. The fish and chip van comes every Wednesday evening from half past four till six o'clock,it parks in Townfield.A laundry van and a vegetable van also come to the village.
